    • Constructor Detail

      • SocketController

        public SocketController(java.io.ObjectInputStream in,
                        java.io.ObjectOutputStream out,
                        LoginHandler loginHandler,
                        boolean single)
        SocketController constructor, client side to manage socket connections. There is one SocketController for each Client.
        Parameters:
        in - is the inputStream used to read socket responses from the server
        out - is the outputStream used to send socket requests to the server
        loginHandler - is the handler of the login stage
        single - is true in case of singleplayer match

    • Method Detail

      • request

        public void request(Request request)
        Sends every socket request to the server through the outputstream
        Parameters:
        request - is the socket request sent to the server

      • nextResponse

        public Response nextResponse()
        Reads every socket response received by the server through the inputstream
        Returns:
        the response received from the server
